title: Johnson & Johnson 's net income 2005 to 2019
yAxis: Net income in million U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net income in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 15 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately positive which exists from 2015 to 2011.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2017.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 2017 to 2015.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2011 to 2009.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2009 to 2007.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2007 to 2005.
gold: Johnson & Johnson 's revenues have generally been increasing over the last several years . As of 2019 , Johnson & Johnson 's total net income was estimated to be about 15.12 billion U.S. dollars . This is a slight decrease from the previous year when net income was at about 15.3 billion U.S. dollars .
